Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vPACUnitCost' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vPACUnitCost] GO CREATE VIEW vPACUnitCost AS select t.companyid, t.InventoryID, t.FinPeriodID, case when SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyReceived]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyCreditMemos]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyAssemblyIn]) + SUM(t.[FinBegQty]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyAdjusted]) = 0 then 0 else (SUM(t.[FinBegCost]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdCOGSCredits]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdCostAdjusted]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdCostAssemblyIn]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdCostReceived]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdCreditMemos])) / (SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyReceived]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyCreditMemos]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyAssemblyIn]) + SUM(t.[FinBegQty]) + SUM(t.[FinPtdQtyAdjusted])) end as PACUnitCost from INItemCostHist t group by t.CompanyID,t.InventoryID,t.FinPeriodID
